Name: Pietro Speroni
AboutMe:
I program from when I was 13.

Pascal,
C,

I now mostly program Python. I find it better than any language I have ever programmed.
From an academic pov, I come with a degree in Math, and work in the academic making mathematical models of biological system. Mostly in the area of Artificial Chemistries, Artificial Life and Systems Biology.

I am glad to be here.

I also have a blog ( blog.pietrosperoni.it ), where I occasionally discuss related topics.
